sentences.en: And thereon spend thy many brittle darts.
sentences.cn: 把你的利箭耗费在他们身上.

sentences.en: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.cn: 但我们的屏幕都很脆弱，他们的却很柔软，而且价钱是我们的十分之一。

sentences.en: He has a brittle temper , ie loses his temper easily.

sentences.cn: 他的诺言原来是靠不住的.

sentences.en: In systems such as this we also often find that there are either no tests around this configuration code, or the tests that do exist are brittle and/or not realistic.
sentences.cn: 在这样的系统中，我们经常会发现对于这些配置代码没有进行测试，或者尽管存在测试，但它很脆弱且/或不切实际。

sentences.en: Joanna was diagnosed as having brittle bones.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜被诊断为骨质疏松。

sentences.en: Lydia gave a laugh that sounded unexpectedly brittle.
sentences.cn: 利季娅笑了,笑声意想不到的尖利.

sentences.en: The branches were dry and brittle.
The fibers lose strength and become brittle.
The pond was covered in a brittle layer of ice.
sentences.cn: 池塘覆盖了一层易碎的冰.

sentences.en: The substance had a hard, brittle nature.
sentences.cn: 这种物质具有坚硬而易碎的特性.

sentences.en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentences.cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

sentences.en: This may help to undermine the brittle truce that currently exists.
sentences.cn: 这也许会火上浇油，破坏当前脆弱不稳的休战局面。

words.tran_cn: [材] 脆性，[材] 脆度；脆弱性

phrases.tran_cn: 脆性破坏；脆性疲劳；脆性失败

trans.tran_cn: 易碎的，难以相处的，尖刻暴躁的，冷淡的，声音尖利的
